      • getDuplicates

        java.util.List<Pokemon> getDuplicates(int trainerId)
        Method for fetching all duplicate pokemon of a specfiic trainer. Takes an int
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of pokemon objects

      • loginAuthentication

        java.lang.String loginAuthentication(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                     javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Creates a new trainer and assigns the username and password to the object

      • purchasePokemon

        boolean purchasePokemon(java.lang.String username,
                        int cost)
        Removes the credits from a trainers wallet. Because of the cache, this will just try to remove the credits from the account, and not remove the Pokemon.

      • redeemAll

        int[] redeemAll(int trainerId)
        Redeem all Pokemon for a specific trainer.
        Parameters:
        trainerId - ID of the current trainer.

      • redeemSpecific

        int[] redeemSpecific(int trainerId,
                     int pokeId)
        Redeems a specific Pokemon from a trainer's collection.
        Parameters:
        trainerId - ID of the current trainer.
        pokeId - ID of the Pokemon being redeemed.
        Returns:
        the amount of credits of credits given (index 0) and total credits (index 1).

      • verifyLogin

        Trainer verifyLogin(java.lang.String username,
                    java.lang.String password)
        Verifies via SQL whether the user login is correct
